name: Indigestion & Upset Stomach
description: Discomfort in the upper abdomen including bloating, gas, nausea, or a feeling of fullness. Often related to eating too quickly, rich foods, or stress.
approaches: Carminative herbs to relieve gas and bloating
Bitter herbs before meals to stimulate digestion
whenToSeek: If symptoms persist, are severe, include vomiting blood, unexplained weight loss, or difficulty swallowing
